short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crowdfund and earn bounties on Github

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crowfund and earn bounties directly on GitHub! 

Havi is a crowdfunding platform for bugs on GitHub. Anyone can add funds to a bug or claim it. You can search for bounties too!
When a developer claims a bounty, the backers get an email with a link to reject the bounty if it was falsely claimed.
If no one rejects the bounty, the claimant will receive the bounty in their bank account after a week.
If someone rejects the bounty, Havi will facilitate dispute resolution between both parties as efficiently as possible. 



Havi is powered by Stripe, so we don't store any of your payment data directly.

www.havi.co
